_comment: Phonetic overrides for voice generation. Use when pronunciation differs from displayed text.
gz_dz_help_01: CURSE THESE REBBELS! They have slaughtered my men! Is there no one left to fight?!
gz_lz_explain_01: Shwan Day! I had the rebels surrounded and was on the point of smashing them, when Zhang Jway employed sorcery to prevent my victory.
gz_lz_explain_02: The court sent Yoonuck Zwoh Fung to inquire. He demanded a bribe, but where could I find gold in such circumstances? He reported that I hid behind ramparts and disheartened my army.
gz_lz_explain_03: So I was superseded by Dong Jwoh, and now I go to the capital to answer false charges.
gz_lz_freed_01: Shwan Day! You have saved me, but at great cost. The court will brand you as rebels for attacking imperial soldiers.
gz_lz_freed_02: Your loyalty does you credit. I will return to Guangzong in secret. Go now, before more soldiers come.
gz_zf_01: This is outrage! Let me slay these dogs and free you, Master!
gz_nar_poem_01: As it was in olden time so it is today, The simple white may merit well, Officialdom holds sway; Zhang Fei, the blunt and hasty, Where can you find his pier?
ch1_end_01: But slaying the ungrateful would Mean many deaths a year. Dong Jwoh's fate will be unrolled in later chapters.
